Title: Welcome to the Valley!
Text: Hi @, I hope you have a nice time in the valley, I recommend you swinging by Pierre's General Store to buy some seeds.^^	-Caroline

Title: Lewis' Sprinkler
Text: Look at what I found! I though you may want this, I don't really need it.^^	-Lewis

Title: Queen of Sauce
Text: Hello farmer @, you should watch Queen of Sauce every Sunday, you can learn a lot of things!^^	-Jodi

Title: Buenos dias!
Text: Buenos dias!^Hola Matias, soy tu amigo Jose! Ayer hice una Anguila Frita estupenda, crei que te deberia dar un poco!^^^ (Looks like this mail isn't yours, but you can't do much about it)

Title: Stardrop Meals
Text: Hello @,^We have new food every day, you should come here and see what's the special of the day!^^ -Gus

Title: Pumpkins for Abby
Text: Dear farmer.^Abby loves pumpkins, and you have a lot of space in your farm, that's why I gave you some pumpkin seeds, if you want to make her happy, you could gift it to her.^^ -Caroline

Title: Strawberries
Text: Hey @. Do you like strawberries?^Egg Festival will happen the 13 of Spring, remember that my husband Pierre will be selling strawberry seeds only during the festival, you may want to save up some money.^^ -Caroline

Title: Cauliflowers for Maru.
Text: My daughter Maru loves cauliflowers, if you want to get along with her, you could gift her one.^^ -Robin

Title: Wood from Robin
Text: Hi @, A friend of mine gave me a lot of wood, I though you may want some.^^ -Robin

Title: Wizard and the Secret Woods
Text: Hello @.^To the North of my tower, there is a secret forest full of slimes, you can find lots of hardwood and even catch some special fishes there, you could use an Iron Axe to access there.^^ -Wizard

Title: Haley's Ice cream
Text: Do you like ice cream? Of course! Everyone likes ice cream! Well not my sister Emily but she is weird LOL^^ -Haley

Title: Mr. Qi
Text: Hello Mr. Qi.^I know they can be helpful but I don't think you should do that to them without even knowing if they are worthy. You should at least watch them before taking a step in the wrong way.^^ -Maxis

Title: Giant Crops
Text: Hello farmer.^You may have realised by now. If you plant nine crops of the same type in a 3x3 formation, they may grow a giant crop, which will give you more resources, only a handful of seeds can reach that size.^^ -Wizard

Title: Random Pizza
Text: Take this buddy^^ (You don't owe me anything, it's a gift)

Title: Leah's Salad
Text: Today I foraged lots of things! I thought you may want to taste some of the things I foraged.^^ -Leah

Title: Haley's Boots
Text: Hi @, I was making room in my closet and found these boots, I thought you would like to have them.^^ -Haley

Title: SPAMTOM G. SPAMTOM
Text: HEY FARMER,^IT'S ME, SPAMTON G. SPAMTON. I JUST SENT [[YOU]] A MESSAGE BOMB. I HOPE YOU ENJOY THE [[GIFT]] THAT [NOT JOJA] SENT YOU. IN CASE YOU ARE STILL [ALIVE] REMEMBER THAT YOU CAN BUY SEEDS AND A LOT OF PRODUCTS IN JOJA(C). ^^I USED TO BE [NOTHING] BUT THE E_MAIL GUY, LOOK AT ME NOW, I'M THE MAIL GUY. I'M GROWING POWERFUL

Title: Sebastian's Frozen Tear
Text: Hi @. ^I love frozen tears, I thought that you may also like them...^^ -Sebastian

Title: Marnie's Milk
Text: Hi @. ^Remember that dairy products are good for you sometimes.^^ -Marnie

Title: Harvey's Medicine
Text: Hi @. ^Farming is exhausting, but this can help you, you can also buy more in my clinic.^^ -Harvey

Title: Maru's Battery Pack
Text: Hi @! ^You helped me a lot, it's only fair if I help you too.^^ -Maru
